data.text:
May Yul Edochie Biography, Wiki, Age, Husband, Net Worth: May Yul-Edochie is Nollywood actor Yul Edochie’s first wife. She is the CEO of Deke Investigations and an illegitimate specialist. May has been Yul-Edochi’s wife for many years, and while she is well-known for her marriage, she has also established a career as a prominent guest star and brand spokesperson. Here is a list of the most notable celebrities from Bihar, Nigeria. In a popular novel, Yule-Edochi is known as Edochi’s wife. The pair has been married for 17 years and lives happily ever after.

May Yul Edochie Biography, Wiki, Age, Net Worth, Parents, Sister

Full Name May Yul Edochie Age 41 year Old Birth Date September 16, 1983 Birth Place Anambra, Nigeria Material status Married Husband Name Yul Edochie Religion Christian Nationality Nigerian Father Name NA Mother Name NA Eye Color Dark Brown Hair Color Black Height 5 Feet 8 Inches(Approx) Weight 58 kg(Approx) Net Worth $2 million

Who is May Yul Edochie

May Yul-Edochi is a well-known Nigerian philanthropist and entrepreneur, best known as the wife of Nollywood actor and politician Yul Edochie. May has built a name for herself despite being married to a high-profile star. Her spouse is a well-known Nigerian actor and social media personality. For the past 17 years, the pair has been married.

May Yul Edochie Age, Early Life, Biography, Wiki, Education

May Yul Edochie was born in Anambra, Nigeria on September 16, 1983. Her age in 2024 will be around 41. There is no information about her parents accessible. There is no information on whether or whether she has siblings. Her given name is May Aligwe, but she changed it after marriage. She enrolled in a local school for her elementary education. We discovered her high school graduation from Airforce Secondary School, Ikeja, while scrolling through her Facebook account. She thereafter began her undergraduate studies at Enugu State University of Science and Technology.

Career

May Edochie is the owner of DDK Investments, her investing organization. She not only makes a nice living from her business, but she also makes a good living from endorsement deals. May Edochie has received sponsorships from brands such as RealityPros and Misiano Skincare, which has contributed to her financial success. May is a well-known humanitarian as well as a successful businesswoman. She is the founder of the Maze Oasis Foundation, a non-governmental organization that assists widows, underprivileged people, and victims of violence in Nigeria and worldwide.

Yul Edochie, her spouse, is a well-known actor. She appeared in several films and television shows. Royal Castle, The Palace, The Billionaires, The Affectionate Wife, Royal Maid, Python Queen, Royal Choice, Moms at War, and many more are among her works. Aside from that, she hoped to enter politics in 2017.

May Yul Edochie Husband

Yul Edochie and May Aligwe originally met at the University of Port Harcourt. After some time of communicating, they began dating one another. They married in 2004 with the blessings of their relatives and family members. Let us inform you that in April 2022, Yul Edochie presented the world to her second wife, Judy Austin, through an Instagram post and spread the news. May and Yul are the proud parents of four amazing children. Dani Edochie is the name of their eldest daughter. In addition, the couple has three adorable boys. Carl Edochie, Kambi Edochie, and Victory Zane Chukubuike Yul Edochie are her sons.

Halima Shehu Biography

Yul Edochie’s first son died

Their first son, Kambilinachukwu Edochie, died at the age of 16 on March 30, 2023, according to reports. Fans and colleagues alike were shocked and saddened to learn of her death. Even though the reason for her death has not been revealed, many individuals have offered their condolences and asked for prayers for the Edochie family at this terrible time. Although Yul Edochie has yet to comment on her son’s death, colleagues and fans have expressed their condolences and support for the actor and her family on social media.

Net Worth

The net worth of May Yul-Edochie is reported to be approximately $2 million. Her business activities are her principal source of income, although she also receives from her foundation and other commercial operations.

Important Facts

She is a fervent Christian who attends church services regularly.

Mrs. Edochie speaks Igbo, Yoruba, and Hausa, among other Nigerian languages.

She is an advocate for women’s rights and has talked on several occasions about the need to empower women in Nigeria.

May Yule-Edochi is a globe traveler who has visited several nations.

May is always spending time with her family and children.

She enjoys eating at well-known eateries.

Yul Edochie’s wife frequently posts inspirational remarks on social media.

She frequently advertises a variety of skincare products on Instagram.

May Yule-Edochi endorses several products.
